Sentencas: The thermo-economic and environmental analysis of an integrated power system with carbon capture and storage was investigated.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: The plant comprises solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), gas turbine (GTC), steam turbine (STC), organic Rankine (ORC), absorption refrigeration (ARC), and carbon capture and storage (CCS) technologies.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: The system was modelled in terms of energy, exergy and economics, and implemented in the Engineering Equation Solver and MS Excel spreadsheet.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: Key results show that net power is 147.2 MW, with energy and exergy efficiencies of 40.2 and 39.9%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: A total exergy destruction rate of 217.4 MW is obtained, and distributed as 38, 18, 14, 13, 10, and 7%, respectively, for gas turbine, SOFC, ARC, CCS, ORC and STC.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: The study further propose that 96.7% of carbon dioxide (CO2) can be captured from the flue gases, and 807.3 kton of CO2 can be transported to depleted oil reservoirs annually for enhanced oil recovery.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: Cost analysis suggests that the plant's total cost, including the cost of transporting and storing CO2, is $ 186 million and cost of CO2 avoidance is $ 110 per tonne, while the levelized cost of energy and payback on investment are put at $ 0.123 per kWh and 5.2 years, respectively.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: Parametric simulation of pressure ratio, SOFC temperature, fuel utilization factor, excess combustion air, length of pipeline and interest rate were also investigated.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology

Sentencas: The study has the potentials of pushing the energy policy landscape of an energy disadvantaged economy into a broader energy access and climate action terrains.
Titulo: Thermo-economic and environmental analysis of integrated power plant with carbon capture and storage technology
